author: Vince Lombardi
text: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.

author: Walt Disney
text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

author: Thomas Edison
text: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

author: Zig Ziglar
text: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.

author: Les Brown
text: It's not over until I win.

author: Napoleon Hill
text: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.

author: Steve Jobs
text: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.

author: Maya Angelou
text: You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated.

author: Michael Jordan
text: I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.

author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
text: Strength does not come from the body. It comes from the will.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

author: Oprah Winfrey
text: Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another steppingstone to greatness.

author: Albert Einstein
text: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

author: Henry Ford
text: Whether you think you can, or you think you can't – you're right.

author: J.K. Rowling
text: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.

author: Viktor E. Frankl
text: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.

author: Muhammad Ali
text: Don’t count the days, make the days count.

author: Confucius
text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
text: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

author: Winston Churchill
text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

author: Jim Rohn
text: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.

author: Nelson Mandela
text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

author: Aristotle
text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act but a habit.

author: C.S. Lewis
text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

author: W. Clement Stone
text: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.

author: Jim Valvano
text: Don't give up. Don't ever give up.

author: Bruce Lee
text: Absorb what is useful, discard what is not, add what is uniquely your own.

author: Richard Branson
text: Screw it, let's do it.

author: Helen Keller
text: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.

author: Thomas Jefferson
text: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.

author: Rumi
text: The wound is the place where the light enters you.

author: Dale Carnegie
text: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.

author: Frank Sinatra
text: The best revenge is massive success.

author: Zig Ziglar
text: You don't have to be good to start, but you have to start to be good.

author: Coco Chanel
text: Success is most often achieved by those who don’t know that failure is inevitable.

author: Herman Melville
text: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.

author: Mae Jemison
text: Never be limited by other people’s limited imaginations.

author: John C. Maxwell
text: A man must be big enough to admit his mistakes, smart enough to profit from them, and strong enough to correct them.

author: Coco Chanel
text: Success is most often achieved by those who don’t know that failure is inevitable.

author: J.K. Rowling
text: It is impossible to live without failing at something, unless you live so cautiously that you might as well not have lived at all.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
text: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

author: Winston Churchill
text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

author: Jim Rohn
text: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.

author: Nelson Mandela
text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

author: Aristotle
text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act but a habit.

author: C.S. Lewis
text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

author: W. Clement Stone
text: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.

author: Jim Valvano
text: Don't give up. Don't ever give up.

author: Bruce Lee
text: Absorb what is useful, discard what is not, add what is uniquely your own.

author: Richard Branson
text: Screw it, let's do it.
